meanings.definition: relating to, containing, or conveying lymph
meanings.sent1: The lymphous vessels carry fluid throughout the body.
meanings.sent2: Her lymphous glands help fight infections.
meanings.sent3: The doctor joked that his patient's lymphous system was as clear as a mountain stream.
meanings.sent4: The peaceful flow of the lymphous fluid calmed her nerves like a gentle stream.
meanings.sent5: The translucent quality of the lymphous liquid made it seem almost magical.

meanings.sent1: The pale, lymphous color of the liquid indicated its purity.
meanings.sent2: The texture of the substance was smooth and lymphous to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The artist mixed paints to achieve a lymphous hue for her masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The mist rising from the pond had a lymphous quality, creating a serene atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The gentle, lymphous glow of the fireflies lit up the night.

meanings.sent1: Regular exercise can help maintain a healthy lymphous system.
meanings.sent2: The lymphous nodes play a crucial role in filtering toxins from the body.
meanings.sent3: The scientist's quirky invention aimed to boost the lymphous functions of the body.
meanings.sent4: Her care for others was like a guardian angel watching over their lymphous well-being.
meanings.sent5: The intricate network of lymphous vessels was a marvel of nature's design.
